Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、どうして地下なんだ？ 水路だったら地上でもいいわけだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: So, why'd they put this underground? Wouldn't a waterway work above ground too?

Entry.JapaneseText: 砂の上に水路を作るのって 簡単じゃないですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's not easy making a waterway on the sand.

Entry.JapaneseText: それに地下に作れば 蒸発も防げますから。
Entry.EnglishText: And also, if it's underground, then you can keep the water from evaporating.

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、なるほどなるほど。 一石二鳥ってわけだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, I see, I see. You kill two birds with one stone with that.
